v0.1.0, 2013-03-15 -- Initial release

v0.1.1 (2013-03-15)
-------------------

New
~~~

- Unit tests for Collection, io module

Changes
~~~~~~~

- StandardName now inherits from str

v0.1.2 (2013-03-20)
-------------------

Changes
~~~~~~~

- standard_names package is a namespace package of cmt

Fix
~~~

- Fix bug that allowed standard names to have multiple sets of "__".
